3.text: Sumudu : Harini, I get up at 5 o'clock. At what time do you get up?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme>: <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>, I get up at 5 o'clock. At what time do you get up?</prosody></speak>

4.text: Harini : I get up at 4.45 a.m. and my mother gets up at 4.30 a.m. I help my mother to make tea.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>: I get up at 4.45 a.m. and my mother gets up at 4.30 a.m. I help my mother to make tea.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Sumudu : My mother gets up at 4 o'clock. She makes tea and wakes me up. My sister and I help her to cook.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme>: My mother gets up at 4 o'clock. She makes tea and wakes me up. My sister and I help her to cook.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Harini : We too help our mother to cook. I peel onions and my father scrapes coconut.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>: We too help our mother to cook. I peel onions and my father scrapes coconut.</prosody></speak>

7.text: Sumudu : I worship Lord Buddha and then study for some time.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme>: I worship Lord Buddha and then study for some time.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Harini : We offer flowers to god Ganesh and pray.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>: We offer flowers to god Ganesh and pray.</prosody></speak>

9.text: Sumudu : Our school bus comes at 6.30 a.m. So I get ready and have my breakfast. My sister and I worship our parents and leave home.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme>: Our school bus comes at 6.30 a.m. So I get ready and have my breakfast. My sister and I worship our parents and leave home.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Harini : I walk to school with my mother and brother. We too worship our parents.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme>: I walk to school with my mother and brother. We too worship our parents.</prosody></speak>

12.text: Read the role play and answer the questions.
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the role play and answer the questions.</prosody></speak>

13.text: 1. At what time does Sumudu get up? 2. Who helps her mother to make tea? 3. When does Sumudu leave home? 4. How does Harini go to school? 5. How do you help your parents? e.g. :- I scrape coconut and ......
13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. At what time does <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> get up? 2. Who helps her mother to make tea? 3. When does <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sumudu'>Sumudu</phoneme> leave home? 4. How does <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='harini'>Harini</phoneme> go to school? 5. How do you help your parents? e.g. :- I scrape coconut and ......</prosody></speak>
